00021 #ifndef _OGREOGGSOUND_CALLBACK_H_
00022 #define _OGREOGGSOUND_CALLBACK_H_
00023 
00024 #include "OgreOggSoundPrereqs.h"
00025 
00026 namespace OgreOggSound
00027 {
00028         class OgreOggISound;
00029 
00035         class _OGGSOUND_EXPORT OOSCallback
00036         {
00037         
00038         public:
00039         
00040                 virtual ~OOSCallback(){};
00041                 virtual void execute(OgreOggISound* sound) = 0;
00042 
00043         };
00044 
00045         template<typename T>
00046         class OSSCallbackPointer : public OOSCallback
00047         {
00048 
00049         public:
00050 
00051                 typedef void (T::*MemberFunction)(OgreOggISound* sound);
00052 
00053                 OSSCallbackPointer() : mUndefined(true){}
00054 
00055                 OSSCallbackPointer(MemberFunction func, T* obj) :
00056                         mFunction(func),
00057                         mObject(obj),
00058                         mUndefined(false)
00059                 {}
00060 
00061                 virtual ~OSSCallbackPointer(){}
00062 
00063                 void execute(OgreOggISound* sound)
00064                 {
00065                         if(!mUndefined)
00066                                 (mObject->*mFunction)(sound);
00067                 }
00068 
00069         protected:
00070 
00071                 MemberFunction mFunction;
00072                 T* mObject;
00073                 bool mUndefined;
00074 
00075         }; 
00076 
00077 } 
00078 
00079 #endif  /* _OGREOGGSOUND_CALLBACK_H_ */
